attributes.action: Ban protests aimed at military parades which target troops returning from conflict zones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the grounds that: 
Politicians send our troops in to conflict zones! 
Our military are deployed as instructed by politicians!
Politicians have a duty and responsibility to protect the people who protect our freedom & our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
